setup: The business man opened a shadow puppet theater that should make a fortune!
I took my daughter to a sock puppet theatre...
punchline: It was a show of hands...

setup: I was going to put on a sock puppet show...
Why did the puppet girl said no to going on a date?
punchline: She didn’t want to be felt up

setup: What did one sock puppet say to another?
punchline: You look like you could use a hand.

setup: I think that one puppet from Sesame Street is my favorite vampire ever.
punchline: Some people claim he doesn't count, but I'm certain that he does.

setup: How to kill a sock puppet that's planning to shoot up people?
What do call the world's biggest puppet show?
What do you call a faceless sock puppet?
Ever wonder how many puppeteers there are in the world?
What did the puppet say when he was depressed
I'm surprised Metallica hasn't been on Sesame Street,
punchline: After all they are the Master of Puppets.

setup: If I had a nickel for every time I was cursed by a puppet..
punchline: I'd have two nickels. Which isn't much but it's weird that it happened twice.
